info.title: Microsoft.FileShares
info.description: Azure File Shares Resource Provider API.

get.description: List the operations for the provider
List FileShare resources by subscription ID

post.description: Get file shares provisioning parameters recommendation.

get.description: List FileShare resources by resource group

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The resource name of the file share, as seen by the administrator through Azure Resource Manager.

put.description: Create or update a file share.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The resource name of the file share, as seen by the administrator through Azure Resource Manager.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The resource name of the file share, as seen by the administrator through Azure Resource Manager.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: The resource properties to be updated.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The resource name of the file share, as seen by the administrator through Azure Resource Manager.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

FileShareLimits.description: File share-related limits in the specified subscription/location.

maxFileShares.description: The maximum number of file shares that can be created.

maxFileShareSnapshots.description: The maximum number of snapshots allowed per file share.

maxFileShareSubnets.description: The maximum number of subnets that can be associated with a file share.

maxFileSharePrivateEndpointConnections.description: The maximum number of private endpoint connections allowed for a file share.

minProvisionedStorageGiB.description: The minimum provisioned storage in GiB for a file share.

maxProvisionedStorageGiB.description: The maximum provisioned storage in GiB for a file share.

minProvisionedIOPerSec.description: The minimum provisioned IOPS (Input/Output Operations Per Second) for a file share.

maxProvisionedIOPerSec.description: The maximum provisioned IOPS (Input/Output Operations Per Second) for a file share.

minProvisionedThroughputMiBPerSec.description: The minimum provisioned throughput in MiB/s for a file share.

maxProvisionedThroughputMiBPerSec.description: The maximum provisioned throughput in MiB/s for a file share.

limits.description: The limits for the file share.

provisioningConstants.description: The provisioning constants for the file share.

FileShareLimitsResponse.description: Response structure for file share limits API.

properties.description: The properties of the file share limits.

FileShareListResult.description: The response of a FileShare list operation.

value.description: The FileShare items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

mountName.description: The name of the file share as seen by the end user when mounting the share, such as in a URI or UNC format in their operating system.

hostName.description: The host name of the file share.

mediaTier.description: The storage media tier of the file share.

redundancy.description: The chosen redundancy level of the file share.

protocol.description: The file sharing protocol for this file share.

provisionedStorageGiB.description: The provisioned storage size of the share in GiB (1 GiB is 1024^3 bytes or 1073741824 bytes). A component of the file share's bill is the provisioned storage, regardless of the amount of used storage.

provisionedStorageNextAllowedDowngrade.description: A date/time value that specifies when the provisioned storage for the file share is permitted to be reduced.

provisionedIOPerSec.description: The provisioned IO / sec of the share.

provisionedIOPerSecNextAllowedDowngrade.description: A date/time value that specifies when the provisioned IOPS for the file share is permitted to be reduced.

provisionedThroughputMiBPerSec.description: The provisioned throughput / sec of the share.

provisionedThroughputNextAllowedDowngrad.description: A date/time value that specifies when the provisioned throughput for the file share is permitted to be reduced.

includedBurstIOPerSec.description: Burst IOPS are extra buffer IOPS enabling you to consume more than your provisioned IOPS for a short period of time, depending on the burst credits available for your share.

maxBurstIOPerSecCredits.description: Max burst IOPS credits shows the maximum number of burst credits the share can have at the current IOPS provisioning level.

publicAccessProperties.description: The set of properties for control public access.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Gets or sets allow or disallow public network access to azure managed file share

privateEndpointConnections.description: The list of associated private endpoint connections.

FileShareProvisioningConstants.description: Constants used for calculating recommended values of file share provisioning properties.

baseThroughputMiBPerSec.description: Base throughput in MiB per second.

scalarThroughputMiBPerSec.description: Scalar throughput in MiB per second.

FileShareProvisioningRecommendationInput.description: File share provisioning parameters recommendation API input structure.

provisionedStorageGiB.description: The desired provisioned storage size of the share in GiB. Will be use to calculate the values of remaining provisioning parameters.

FileShareProvisioningRecommendationOutpu.description: File share provisioning parameters recommendation API result.

provisionedIOPerSec.description: The recommended value of provisioned IO / sec of the share.

provisionedThroughputMiBPerSec.description: The recommended value of provisioned throughput / sec of the share.

FileShareProvisioningRecommendationReque.description: Request structure for file share provisioning parameters recommendation API.

properties.description: The properties of the file share provisioning recommendation input.

FileShareProvisioningRecommendationRespo.description: Response structure for file share provisioning parameters recommendation API.

properties.description: The properties of the file share provisioning recommendation output.

FileShareProvisioningState.description: The status of file share's ProvisioningState.

values.name: TransientFailure
values.description: The operation is in a transient failure state.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

FileShareSnapshotListResult.description: The response of a FileShareSnapshot list operation.

value.description: The FileShareSnapshot items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

snapshotTime.description: The FileShareSnapshot time in UTC in string representation

initiatorId.description: The initiator of the FileShareSnapshot. This is a user-defined value.

FileShareSnapshotUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the FileShareSnapshot.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

FileShareSnapshotUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the FileShareSnapshot.

FileShareUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the FileShare.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

FileShareUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the FileShare.

provisionedStorageGiB.description: The provisioned storage size of the share in GiB (1 GiB is 1024^3 bytes or 1073741824 bytes). A component of the file share's bill is the provisioned storage, regardless of the amount of used storage.

provisionedIOPerSec.description: The provisioned IO / sec of the share.

provisionedThroughputMiBPerSec.description: The provisioned throughput / sec of the share.

publicAccessProperties.description: The set of properties for control public access.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Gets or sets allow or disallow public network access to azure managed file share

liveShares.description: File share usage data for active file shares.

FileShareUsageDataResponse.description: Response structure for file shares usage in the specified subscription/location.

properties.description: The properties of the file share usage data.

fileShareCount.description: The number of active file shares.

NfsProtocolProperties.description: Properties specific to the NFS protocol.

rootSquash.description: Root squash defines how root users on clients are mapped to the NFS share.

PublicAccessProperties.description: The set of properties for control public access.

allowedSubnets.description: The allowed set of subnets when access is restricted.

PublicNetworkAccess.description: State of the public network access.

values.name: Enabled
values.description: The public network access is enabled

values.name: Disabled
values.description: The public network access is disabled
